message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DB, cs.OS, cs.AR, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the deployment of persistent memory in datacenters, which falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The paper also proposes different architectures for building data stores with persistent memory, which is related to Database Systems (cs.DB) and Operating Systems (cs.OS). The use of disaggregated persistent memory also involves issues related to Architecture (cs.AR) and Systems and Control (cs.SY).
